title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Investor Compensation Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Investor Compensation Act 

1998 (Prescription of Bodies and Persons) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 21 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited investor compensation act 1998 (prescription body persons) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 21 january 2024

title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: 2. The Investor Compensation Act 1998 (Prescription of Bodies and
text_raw:
2. The Investor Compensation Act 1998 (Prescription of Bodies and 
Persons) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 395 of 2015) are amended, in Regulation 
2, by the substitution of the following paragraphs for paragraphs (d) and (e): 

“(d) Angela Black; 

(e) Eoin Motherway.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 December, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [612] 3

title: Central Bank and Financial Services Authority of Ireland Act 2003 (No. 12 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to provide for the nomination of persons 
for appointment as directors of The Investor Compensation Company DAC. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [612]
